Explore Our Vision

## Built for a

## Modular Future

Modular blockchains are easy to launch, but isolated from existing chains.
Hyperlane solves this by enabling you to launch with built-in
interoperability.

Explore Our Vision

## Explore The

## Interchain Highway

Save yourself from depending on a permissioned platform. Use Hyperlane to get
on the Interchain Highway and connect to any chain!

## Why Permissionless

You want to launch a blockchain/rollup

Launch rollup with rollup provider in a few clicks. Easy.

Lobby *permissioned* interoperability teams to deploy on your rollup. Not
easy.

Hyperlane makes it easy. Permissionlessly deploy interoperability out-of-the-
box now.

Hyperlane makes it easy. Permissionlessly deploy interoperability out-of-the-
box now.

## Modular Security

Hyperlane’s modular security stack gives you the power to customize your
interchain security model. Stack additional security layers so nothing gets
past your defenses.

EconomicSecurity

Leverage any asset to secure your interchain communication. Whether it’s a
major asset like ETH, your own native token, or even a restaked asset!

CustomISMs

Hyperlane offers multiple out-of-the-box Interchain Security Modules (ISMs)
that you can choose from. Not satisfied? Mix and match existing ISMs or build
your own. Future proof your protocol with Hyperlane!

DynamicSecurity

No ‘one-size-fits-all’ security! Bring the context of your users intents to
your security. Benefit by using the appropriate security module based on the
situation at hand.

## Expand With Hyperlane

Interchain

 Apps

Tap into userbases and liquidity in distant ecosystems. Level up your app with
a Hyperlane integration.

Chains +

Rollups

Bring interchain access to your blockchain ecosystem or rollup toolkit with
Permissionless Interoperability.

Interchain

Assets

Take tokens and NFTs interchain with Hyperlane's Warp Routes. Launch
interchain-native assets on day one.

## The Hyperlane Stack

Messaging

Use our on-chain API for sending and receiving interchain messages across any
chain.

Permissionless

Deployment

Deploy the Hyperlane interoperability stack to any blockchain, anytime.

Interchain

Accounts

Create and control accounts on remote chains without needing a deployment on
those chains.

Warp Routes

Permissionlessly bridge any token to any chain via Hyperlane. No need to
whitelist your token.

Interchain Queries

Query the state of any contract on any Hyperlane-supported chain. Bring Oracle
services to your chain or rollup with ease.
